name: create_raw-86ebf905-53c6-4ba4-a906-d21f631bc454
content: import org.sonatype.nexus.blobstore.api.BlobStoreManager; import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.storage.WritePolicy; configuration = repository.createHosted('raw-86ebf905-53c6-4ba4-a906-d21f631bc454', 'raw-hosted', BlobStoreManager.DEFAULT_BLOBSTORE_NAME, WritePolicy.ALLOW, true); repository.createRepository(configuration);
